channel.title: Parameter dont stay position after demux sh
channel.description: He there again, after a demux S_H i used a pot meter sending a midi CC to control the amount of the LFO. My problem is now that when i switch to the next LFO with the the demux object,that the position of the last setted potmeter applies also to the next selected. When i use a normal demux without S_H it goes offcoarse to the 0 point again. i will embed a picture to make it more clear. my question is or i can keep the position of the parameter while skipping thru the parameters.maybe it is all because of my potmeters what is leaking a bit and giving a position anyway ?

item.title: Parameter dont stay position after demux sh
item.dc:creator: @kashis dennis
item.description:
@kashis wrote:

hehe yeah great

the example patch is working ,also if i control the button via midi with my potmeter. It do exactly what i want ,this is great! . I just need now a way how to intergrate it in my project . I want to control with one button al the amounts of the LFO (in this case ). the patch was via the midi/intern/cc thin object and a demuxer to make one potmeter, 4 midi CC's, and this midi i assigned to a mixer on every LFO outlet. Im sure is possible and i will find the way

Read full topic
item.source: Parameter dont stay position after demux sh

item.title: Parameter dont stay position after demux sh
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Ha, I understand. I have 2 kids myself

Yes it will keep the value you have previously fed into the the hook object, untill you reach that value again. It works with a regular demux, doesnt need the demux sh.

Read full topic
item.source: Parameter dont stay position after demux sh

item.title: Parameter dont stay position after demux sh
item.dc:creator: @kashis dennis
item.description:
@kashis wrote:

yes im looking in it as we speak but have a hungry 2 year old next to me also haha
it will keep the pot's position untill you reached the hook point ?if i understand correct or am i completly off? still noob

Read full topic

item.title: Parameter dont stay position after demux sh
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

It is pretty straight forward.... Did you look at the help file? Just click on the little triangle in the upper left corner of the object and choose "help".

Read full topic

item.title: Parameter dont stay position after demux sh
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Hey man I made a post about a similar issue yesterday. Try @hellcores custom object from the community library called "hookmod". There is a very easy to follow help file included.

Check this thread:

Need help with multiplexor set up for Modular thing add on board

Read full topic
